As soon as Quickstrike entered, the huge monster thing roared... and
started doing something unexpected. It was actually clapping hands.

???:TOY!!!!!! TOY COME BACK!!!!! PLAY!!!!

It walked up to the "toy" and happily giggled as it clumsily tried to
grab Quickstrike.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "CatMaster o" <CatMastero@y...> wrote:
> "Alright already!" Quickstrike muttered and reluctently walked back 
> into the doorless room.  He charged a cyber venom beam for the 
> monster.
> "Here monster, monster, monster" He called to it.
